resources.string: Questions answered privately will used for matching but hidden from your profile
Next, you will complete a quick questionnaire which will be used to calculate your compatibility with other users and recommended date ideas.
The more questions you answer, the more accurate your results will be!
You\'ve complete the compatibility questionnaire.\n\nNow let\'s see your profile, potential matches, and recommended date ideas!
\"Hey boo, thanks for the invite. Can\'t wait to meet you! üòò\"
